testcase.classname: features to test initiate for digital products transaction and risk management functionality
testcase.name: Transaction add to card Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user on my shopify store page.........................................passed When user is login in to store with "https://amit-test-04-09-01.myshopify.com/" and "lohyau".passed And click on enter button...................................................passed When user is navigated to store home page...................................passed And click on catalog........................................................passed When user search and add digital product in card "digital products 002".....passed When click add to card and check out........................................passed When user fill billing address from CustomerDetails_XLSX_10.xlsx and 2......passed And click on continue to payment............................................passed When user fill credit card detail...........................................passed And click on pay now button.................................................passed Then user is navigated to order detail page.................................passed When user login to vt customer portal "https://vt-customer-dev.azurewebsites.net" user "mavejen717@enamelme.com" and password "Dcsharma@2020".passed And navigate to risk management list page...................................passed And search order with order id..............................................passed And click for transaction summary...........................................passed And check positive negative attributes......................................passed Then user logout............................................................passed
